channel.title: Running client fail
channel.description: well when i run any client i get this error... [code]The system cannot find the path specified. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Gui Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Gui at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: Gui. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .[/code] or [code]Error: Could not find or load main class Gui Press any key to continue . . .[/code] and heres my code [code]@echo off Title Client cd ./ "C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32 pause[/code] any idea? im on a windows 7 64bit

item.title: Running client fail
item.dc:creator: @deathbyu deathbyu
item.description:
@deathbyu wrote:

well when i run any client i get this errorâ€¦

The system cannot find the path specified. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Gui Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Gui at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: Gui. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .
or

Error: Could not find or load main class Gui Press any key to continue . . .
and heres my code

@echo off Title Client cd ./ "C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32 pause
any idea? im on a windows 7 64bit
